snippet.title: Northgard Campaign Trailer - Rig's Saga
snippet.description:
Hello Northgardians!

Here is the official trailer for the campaign mode of Northgard: Rig's Saga! In this campaign, you'll be playing Rig, son of the Viking High King, in his quest for vengeance after the murder of his father.  Through the different chapters, you get the help of his bannermen. 

To completely finish the 11 chapters of the campaign, you will need to master all the clan's specificities and tame the wilderness of Northgard...

The campaign, and the full release of the game, will be available on March 7th, marking the end of Northgard Early Access period!

In the name and on behalf of all the Shiro Games team, I thank you so much for your support during last year. We hope you'll enjoy the campaign and the game ;-)

Finally, please let me assure you that we're not done working on Northgard! There are already so many clans, multiplayer features and gameplay innovation we want to implement!

Once again, thank you so much for believing in this project :)

Shiro Games
